EmailTemplate.name: Trainee intern removal notification - supervisor sponsor
EmailTemplate.subject: Department of Licensing - You removed {!Associations__c.Child_Licensee_Name__c} as an {!Associations__c.Child_License_Type__c} under your supervision
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
LICENSED SUBMITTED Hi {!MUSW__License2__c.Applicant_Full_Name__c},
Your application is currently under review. We will reach out directly with any questions.
Thanks & Regards, Washington Department of Licensing
